The Drones continued with their work, trying to extract Blaze's and 
Silverscout's spark


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> the drones began to do thier dirty work when an unexpected side 
effect of
> the mutant virus kicked in. The wolf in Silver Scout took over, 
senseing
> it's life was in jeopardy. The wolf awoke and snapped it's head to 
the side
> tearing away from the spark extracting drone. Still being held by 
the black
> fortress' security she whipped her head side to side snapping and 
squirming
> to get free. Around her ankes drops of her plasma based energeon 
began to
> fall splattering inkblot like drops on the floor of the Predacon 
base.
> 
> The virus in Blaze was not complete yet as she fought to regain
> consciousness. She was helpless to stop the drone from doing what 
it was
> there to do.

extract

behind

gas

came in

extract
